MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win2000,WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Windows 8,Windows 10,WinServer,WinOther,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Server 2000,Windows Server 2003,Windows Server 2008,Windows Server 2008r2,Windows Server 2012,Windows Tablet PC Edition 2005,Windows Media Center Edition 2005,WinVista,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,WinVista x64,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Some installer changes, marketing changes and usability changes.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: AMD/Intel Core 2 Duo compatible CPU at 3 GHz, 2 GB RAM

English.Keywords: DOC, PDF, DOCX, RTF, TXT, HTML, etc., document converter, convert to pdf, convert doc, PDF to word, DOC, PDF, DOCX, convert to HTML, pdf writer, pdf maker, pdf convertor, convert to word, create e book, compress files, watermark PDF, protect document
English.Char_Desc_45: Convert text files between various formats.
English.Char_Desc_80: Convert files between DOC, PDF, DOCX, HTML, etc. Create e-books & Web pages.
English.Char_Desc_250: Convert your files between DOC, PDF, DOCX, RTF, TXT, HTML, etc. Protect your PDF files against editing, copying or printing. Apply personal watermark to your files. Adjust documents for Web publishing. Zip and attach files in the program interface.
English.Char_Desc_450: Convert your files between DOC, PDF, DOCX, TXT, HTML, etc. Work with e-book formats such as e-Pub, DjVu or FB2. Create password and protect your PDF-docs. Use Command Line Mode to automate routine work using ready conversion templates. Adjust documents for Web publishing. AVS Document Converter is a part of the AVS4YOU.com package. Register once at avs4you.com and use all tools from the AVS4YOU.com package. Subscribe for $49/year or $79/lifetime.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Convert documents between various formats. Work with text files and images without any additional graphics or editing software. Convert your files between DOC, PDF, DOCX, RTF, TXT, HTML, etc. Convert PDF format to the light-weight DOCX. Transfer regular text formats to e-Pub format and create your own e-books easily. Open and convert such e-book formats as DjVu and FB2 to all key formats supported by AVS Document Converter. Create password and protect your PDF-docs. Apply restrictions for editing, copying or printing your document by the recipients. Or identify your files with a personal watermark. Zip bulky files before or after the data conversion and attach them to your e-mails directly in AVS Document Converter interface. Save text files as images with JPEG or GIF extension. Command line mode allows you not only to convert a lot of documents simultaneously but merge several files into one, watermark PDFs, introduce PDF editing, copying and printing restrictions. Compress your bulky files to ZIP format before or after the data conversion. Password the output archive and attach it to your e-mail directly in AVS Document Converter interface. Convert your documents to HTML format and publish them as a Web page. AVS Document Converter is a part of the AVS4YOU.com package. Register once at avs4you.com and work with all tools from the AVS4YOU.com package. Subscribe for $49/year or $79/lifetime. AVS4YOU tools let you easily rip, convert and edit audio/video files, edit images, burn DVDs, create ringtones, upload videos to portable devices, players, phones and much more!
